item.title: Death incorrect
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Hey guys, here are my methods, but first, i need this bug fixing, what happens, is on the first time everything is correct, then the second time the guy doesn’t get teled or his stats restored, please help. public int DeathTeleTimer = -1; public boolean StartDeathTele = false; public boolean process(){ if(StartDeathTele){ DeathTeleTimer = -1; pEmote = 0x328; playerSE = 0x328; teleportToX = randomteleX(); teleportToY = randomteleY(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; outStream.createFrame(74); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(203); StartDeathTele = false; IsDead = false; } if(!StartDeathTele && DeathTeleTimer != -1){ DeathTeleTimer -= 1; } if(DeathTeleTimer == 0){ StartDeathTele = true; } public boolean ApplyDead(){ DeathTeleTimer = 10; Thanks and i will give u a reward of the R* type.

Read full topic
